Expands MAX-STREAM Lineup'' on '''AnandTech'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33073-linksys-velop-whole-home-mesh-wi-fi-reviewed '' Linksys Velop Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :'''CPU:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Quad-core Wave2 2T2R abgn/ac WiSoC) :'''Flash:''' [[Samsung]] KLM4G1FEPD (4GB eMMC), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) :'''2.4GHz Radio:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 + 2x MSC5533621E (2.4GHz PA) :'''5GHz Radio #1:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 + 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY85408-11 (PA) :'''5GHz Radio #2:''' [[QCA]] QCA9886 (2T2R) + 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY85408-11 (PA) :'''ZigBee:''' ''[[Silicon Labs]]'' EM3581 (SoC) + ''SiGe'' SE2432L (2.4GHz FEM) :'''Bluetooth:''' [[CSR]] (CSR1021/CSR8510 ?) Bluetooth 4.0 LE SoC :'''Switch:''' [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8072 GbE (1x LAN/1x WAN) *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8090/linksys-velop-mesh-whole-home-wireless-system-review/index.html '' Linksys Velop Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi Reviewed'' on '''TweakTown'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/linksys-velop-review '' Linksys Velop WHW03 Reviewed'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_whw03_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/whw03_v1 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/builds-for-linksys-whw03-v2-v1/60745 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== * [[List of Wireless Systems]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
